NIT 899.999.082-3 63.311.437 42,515% OTROS ACCIONISTAS MINORITARIOS 207.917 0,140% TOTAL 148.914.162 100% Teniendo en cuenta la solicitud particular de desglose de participación accionaria de los accionistas GRUPO ENERGIA BOGOTA S.A. E.S.P. y ENEL AMÉRICAS SA, la administración de la sociedad manifiesta que no tiene control sobre el registro actualizado de la composición accionaria de dichas sociedades, por lo que no es posible realizar certificación en tal sentido. It contains information about the shareholding structure of the company, showing the percentage participation of each shareholder. 2. **PRIORITY CHECKS**: - Not BLANK: The document contains substantial text - Not LINK_ONLY: While there are links mentioned, they are supplementary information, not the primary content 3. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION**: The document is issued by ENEL COLOMBIA S.A. ESP (a corporate entity). It is not issued by DIAN or Chamber of Commerce. 4. **DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS**: This document clearly functions as a certification of the ownership structure and shareholding composition of ENEL COLOMBIA S.A.
